implementation_roadmap.critical_path: Audio recording and analysis engine represents critical path due to complex real-time processing requirements. Subscription integration must parallel audio development to avoid late-stage integration issues.
implementation_roadmap.risk_mitigation: Primary risks: Audio processing performance on older devices, App Store audio permission approval, subscription flow complexity. Mitigation: Early device testing, clear audio permission justification, RevenueCat sandbox testing throughout development.
implementation_roadmap.testing_strategy: Continuous testing approach: Unit tests for audio algorithms, integration tests for RevenueCat flows, device testing on minimum spec devices, accessibility testing with VoiceOver/TalkBack, performance testing for extended recording sessions.

technical_specifications.component_specifications: Core components: WaveformView (React Native canvas), RecordingSession (Zustand store), AnalysisEngine (Web Worker), SubscriptionManager (RevenueCat wrapper). Audio processing isolated in dedicated modules with TypeScript interfaces for algorithm swapping and testing.
technical_specifications.api_contracts: RevenueCat API for subscription management, Expo AV for audio recording, Firebase for analytics and crash reporting. No custom backend required - client-only architecture with optional cloud storage for premium users via Firebase Storage.
technical_specifications.data_models: Session model: id, timestamp, duration, file_path, metadata. Anomaly model: session_id, timestamp, type, confidence, user_notes. Settings model: audio_quality, sensitivity_threshold, export_format. Subscription model: entitlements, expiration, purchase_history.
technical_specifications.integration_requirements: Expo SDK 50+ for audio APIs, RevenueCat for subscription lifecycle, Firebase for analytics (minimal data collection), Expo SecureStore for encryption keys. All integrations client-side with offline capability for field investigations.

quality_requirements.performance_targets: App startup < 2 seconds, audio recording latency < 100ms, FFT analysis < 50ms per frame, memory usage < 150MB during extended sessions, battery life > 4 hours continuous recording on standard devices.
quality_requirements.accessibility_requirements: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance with VoiceOver/TalkBack support for all audio interfaces, Dynamic Type scaling up to 200%, high contrast mode support, alternative audio feedback for visual waveform elements, minimum 44pt/48dp touch targets.
quality_requirements.testing_coverage: 90% code coverage for audio processing algorithms, 100% coverage for subscription flows, integration tests for all user journeys, accessibility testing with assistive technologies, performance testing on minimum spec devices (iPhone 12, Android API 24).
quality_requirements.code_quality_standards: TypeScript strict mode enabled, ESLint with React Native rules, Prettier for formatting, pre-commit hooks for quality gates, comprehensive error boundaries, proper cleanup of audio resources, no memory leaks during extended sessions.

standards_compliance.subscription_store_compliance: RevenueCat integration ensures App Store and Google Play compliance with proper subscription lifecycle handling, transparent pricing display, restoration flows, and cancellation management. All subscription UI follows platform guidelines.
standards_compliance.accessibility_design: Complete VoiceOver and TalkBack support with semantic labeling for complex audio interfaces. Dynamic Type scaling, high contrast support, reduced motion alternatives. All audio analysis results accessible via screen reader with descriptive announcements.
standards_compliance.privacy_analytics: Firebase Analytics with minimal data collection, no audio content transmission, Privacy Policy compliance for GDPR/CCPA. User control over analytics and cloud features. Local-first architecture protecting sensitive investigation data.
standards_compliance.testing_release_readiness: Comprehensive testing strategy covering unit, integration, accessibility, and performance testing. Device testing across iOS/Android minimum specs. Subscription sandbox testing. Beta testing with target user group (paranormal investigators).
